normal\_form\_rules: Rewrite χ∘δ and χ∘ψ into χ→δ and χ→ψ maps plus commutation terms.
d/dχ is always moved inward to act on the nearest semantic operator.
Discrete χΔ forms rewrite into continuous d/dχ when Δχ → 0.
Σ contractions are performed \*after\* χ evolution unless ΣΘ is present.
Polarity drift (Θ∘χ) is simplified before any logical reduction.
Canonical operator order: (spatial ops) → (semantic ops) → ψ → λ → Σ → Θ → χ.
